message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a substantial savings compared to its market value of $15,000, making it an exceptional opportunity for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.
